snippet.title: modded in achievements to Nacht Der Untoten & Verrückt
snippet.description:
New features in my World at War zombies mod, hopefully giving more replayability to the first two maps. Shi No Numa & Der Riese already had achievements, which I just had to port from console.
---------------------------------
Discord Server: https://discord.gg/qs2yN8JBwe
Twitter: https://twitter.com/jb_shady_
Mod download: https://www.ugx-mods.com/forum/mods-releases/61/t4m-nazi-zombies-remastered-der-riese-release/23262/
---------------------------------
I spent about 2 days working on:
- Custom names, descriptions, and icons, with minimal inspiration from BOIII ZC and COD Zombies IOS
- Scripting and testing all 20 of them, also using some of the utility code from later DLCs and stats tracking functionality I previously set up
I tried not to spend too much time, as in true Treyarch fashion you need to work under constraints, and this was a fun challenge.
